org.apache.juneau

Class BeanContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.ContextBuilder
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContextBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanTraverseBuilder, ParserBuilder, ParserGroupBuilder, RestClientBuilder, RestContextBuilder, RestMethodContextBuilder

    public class BeanContextBuilder
extends ContextBuilder
    Builder class for building instances of serializers, parsers, and bean contexts.

    All serializers and parsers extend from this class.

    Provides a base set of common config property setters that allow you to build up serializers and parsers.

    WriterSerializer s = JsonSerializer .create() .set(JSON_simpleMode, true) .set(SERIALIZER_useWhitespace, true) .set(SERIALIZER_quoteChar, "'") .build();

    Additional convenience methods are provided for setting properties using reduced syntax.

    WriterSerializer s = JsonSerializer .create() // Create a JsonSerializerBuilder .simple() // Simple mode .ws() // Use whitespace .sq() // Use single quotes .build(); // Create a JsonSerializer

    • Overview > juneau-marshall > Configurable Properties

      • beanClassVisibility

        public BeanContextBuilder beanClassVisibility(Visibility value)
        Configuration property: Minimum bean class visibility.

        Classes are not considered beans unless they meet the minimum visibility requirements.

        For example, if the visibility is PUBLIC and the bean class is protected, then the class will not be interpreted as a bean class and will be treated as a string.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanClassVisibility
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is Visibility.PUBLIC.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanConstructorVisibility

        public BeanContextBuilder beanConstructorVisibility(Visibility value)
        Configuration property: Minimum bean constructor visibility.

        Only look for constructors with the specified minimum visibility.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanConstructorVisibility
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is Visibility.PUBLIC.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanFilters

        public BeanContextBuilder beanFilters(Object... values)
        Configuration property: Bean filters.

        This is a programmatic equivalent to the @Bean annotation.
        It's useful when you want to use the Bean annotation functionality, but you don't have the ability to alter the bean classes.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanFilters
        Parameters:
        values - The values to add to this property.
        Values can consist of any of the following types:
        • Any bean class that specifies a value for @Bean(typeName).
        • Any subclass of BeanDictionaryList containing a collection of bean classes with type name annotations.
        • Any subclass of BeanDictionaryMap containing a mapping of type names to classes without type name annotations.
        • Any array or collection of the objects above.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanFilters

      • beanMapPutReturnsOldValue

        public BeanContextBuilder beanMapPutReturnsOldValue(boolean value)
        Configuration property: BeanMap.put() returns old property value.

        If true, then the BeanMap.put() method will return old property values.
        Otherwise, it returns null.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanMapPutReturnsOldValue
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:

      • beansRequireDefaultConstructor

        public BeanContextBuilder beansRequireDefaultConstructor(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Beans require no-arg constructors.

        If true, a Java class must implement a default no-arg constructor to be considered a bean.
        Otherwise, the bean will be serialized as a string using the Object.toString() method.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beansRequireDefaultConstructor
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

        This object (for method chaining).

      • beansRequireSerializable

        public BeanContextBuilder beansRequireSerializable(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Beans require Serializable interface.

        If true, a Java class must implement the Serializable interface to be considered a bean.
        Otherwise, the bean will be serialized as a string using the Object.toString() method.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beansRequireSerializable
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.

      • beansRequireSettersForGetters

        public BeanContextBuilder beansRequireSettersForGetters(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Beans require setters for getters.

        If true, only getters that have equivalent setters will be considered as properties on a bean.
        Otherwise, they will be ignored.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beansRequireSettersForGetters
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beansRequireSomeProperties

        public BeanContextBuilder beansRequireSomeProperties(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Beans require at least one property.

        If true, then a Java class must contain at least 1 property to be considered a bean.
        Otherwise, the bean will be serialized as a string using the Object.toString() method.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beansRequireSomeProperties
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is true.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanTypePropertyName

        public BeanContextBuilder beanTypePropertyName(String value)
        Configuration property: Bean type property name.

        This specifies the name of the bean property used to store the dictionary name of a bean type so that the parser knows the data type to reconstruct.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanTypePropertyName
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is "_type".
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • debug

        public BeanContextBuilder debug(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Debug mode.

        Enables the following additional information during serialization:

        • When bean getters throws exceptions, the exception includes the object stack information in order to determine how that method was invoked.
        • Enables BeanTraverseContext.BEANTRAVERSE_detectRecursions.
        • BeanContext.BEAN_debug
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • fluentSetters

        public BeanContextBuilder fluentSetters(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Find fluent setters.

        When enabled, fluent setters are detected on beans.

        Fluent setters must have the following attributes:

        • Public.
        • Not static.
        • Take in one parameter.
        • Return the bean itself.
        • BeanContext.BEAN_fluentSetters
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • ignoreInvocationExceptionsOnGetters

        public BeanContextBuilder ignoreInvocationExceptionsOnGetters(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Ignore invocation errors on getters.

        If true, errors thrown when calling bean getter methods will silently be ignored. Otherwise, a BeanRuntimeException is thrown.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_ignoreInvocationExceptionsOnGetters
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • ignorePropertiesWithoutSetters

        public BeanContextBuilder ignorePropertiesWithoutSetters(boolean value)

      • sortProperties

        public BeanContextBuilder sortProperties(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Sort bean properties.

        When true, all bean properties will be serialized and access in alphabetical order. Otherwise, the natural order of the bean properties is used which is dependent on the JVM vendor.

        • BeanContext.BEAN_sortProperties
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.

      • useJavaBeanIntrospector

        public BeanContextBuilder useJavaBeanIntrospector(boolean value)
        Configuration property: Use Java Introspector.

        Using the built-in Java bean introspector will not pick up fields or non-standard getters/setters.

        • Most @Bean annotations will be ignored if you enable this setting.

      • applyAnnotations

        public BeanContextBuilder applyAnnotations(Class<?> fromClass)
        Description copied from class: ContextBuilder
        Applies any of the various @XConfig annotations on the specified class to this context.

        Applies any of the following annotations:

        • BeanConfig
        • CsvConfig
        • HtmlConfig
        • HtmlDocConfig
        • JsoConfig
        • JsonConfig
        • JsonSchemaConfig
        • MsgPackConfig
        • OpenApiConfig
        • ParserConfig
        • PlainTextConfig
        • SerializerConfig
        • SoapXmlConfig
        • UonConfig
        • UrlEncodingConfig
        • XmlConfig
        • RdfConfig

        Annotations are appended in the following order:

        1. On the package of this class.
        2. On interfaces ordered parent-to-child.
        3. On parent classes ordered parent-to-child.
        4. On this class.
        Overrides:
        applyAnnotations in class ContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        fromClass - The class on which the annotations are defined.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • applyAnnotations

        public BeanContextBuilder applyAnnotations(Method fromMethod)
        Description copied from class: ContextBuilder
        Applies any of the various @XConfig annotations on the specified method to this context.

        Applies any of the following annotations:

        • BeanConfig
        • CsvConfig
        • HtmlConfig
        • HtmlDocConfig
        • JsoConfig
        • JsonConfig
        • JsonSchemaConfig
        • MsgPackConfig
        • OpenApiConfig
        • ParserConfig
        • PlainTextConfig
        • SerializerConfig
        • SoapXmlConfig
        • UonConfig
        • UrlEncodingConfig
        • XmlConfig
        • RdfConfig

        Annotations are appended in the following orders:

        1. On the package of the method class.
        2. On interfaces ordered parent-to-child.
        3. On parent classes ordered parent-to-child.
        4. On the method class.
        5. On this method and matching methods ordered parent-to-child.
        Overrides:
        applyAnnotations in class ContextBuilder
        Parameters:
        fromMethod - The method on which the annotations are defined.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
